snippet.title: Cozy Marbles - Official Gameplay Features Trailer | Future of Play 2024
snippet.description: Cozy Marbles is a relaxing physics sandbox building game about building your own marble runs. Create short & satisfying tracks or huge intricate marble machines. There's no rules or management - just sit back, experiment and be creative.
